We are not bed and breakfast people and really wanted a resort to stay at. The convenient location - at the end of Duval and near Mallory Square were a HUGE plus. I really like the fact that they had their own private beach. Knowing that there would be cruise ships in port two of the days, the beach was a great retreat for us. The pool looked very nice, but I prefer a sandy beach if possible. The service at the beach area was awesome. We had drinks and lunch at the beach bar and grille and enjoyed them. We did not eat any other meals at the resort as there were so many choices in the city. We had a great dinner at Flaming Buoy one night and a wonderful dessert at Better Than Sex Dessert Restaurant. I would like to make Key West a place that we travel to annually and Pier House would definitely be the place that we would stay.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Resort.”
Reviews.Author: Shaynahope
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel. The service by all was exceptional. Location could not have been better. Would only stay here in the future. Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Stingray93
Reviews.Content: For years we stayed at the Westin in Feb, this time we went in July and desided to try the Pier House. Wonderful place right at the end of Duval and Sunset Pier. Very tropical location. The only thing I could stay they might want to look at is the pool, it needs some work. Also, one of the only resort down on Duval that doesn't charge a resort or parking fee.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Key West !!!”
Reviews.Author: loveis4ever123
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here at the Pier House Resort while on vacation in Key West & we must say that we had such an amazing time that we can't wait to go back. We had breakfast, lunch & dinner at their Harbour View CafÃ© restaurant since the food was so delicious. I give credit to their cheff & why go elsewhere? (I recommend you try their shrimp ravioli). At night we had drinks at the ticki bar and relaxed in our balcony over looking the ocean. I do recommend a room with balcony & ocean view (it's worth the luxury). The resort includes plenty of free parking & the heated pool is open 24 hours a day, private beach & beautiful tropical gardens surrounding the resort. There's shopping, restaurants & things to do is all nearby - walking distance. Walk on Duval Street, Mallory Square or go site seeing, The hotel is really nice and clean & provides great staff service. We were very happy & know that no other can compare. We hope to go back real soon!!!

Reviews.Title: “Comfy hotel; Superb location!”
Reviews.Author: renees13
Reviews.Content: Spent a weekend with a girlfriend at the Pier House. We originally booked this hotel because we were looking for a resort and spa, as opposed to just a hotel, however due to a substantial difference in price, we ended up doing our spa retreat at one in town. Still very glad we stayed here though.....The rooms are clean, well appointed and comfortable and the portion of the hotel we were in was very quiet, which can be hard to come by in Key West. We spent 2 days enjoying the small, private beach area and were very well cared for by the staff (beach attendant and servers). We had one dinner at the waterfront restaurant which was wonderful. The best thing however about Pier House is the location.....you are right at the end of the main street in town (Duval), surrounded by food and shopping options, and just blocks from several great restaurants along the waterfront. The walk to Hemingway House is just under a mile and Southernmost Point, just over. All in all a great stay....when in Key West, I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible off-season deal!”
Reviews.Author: AKhuntress
Reviews.Content: Found the Pier House at a visitor's center that got us a great rate in a room looking out into the gardens. We loved the hotel's white sandy beach- perfect for playing in, and the ocean swimming area with an anchored platform and rocks with a variety of fish to see while snorkeling. Service at the Beach bar and Grill was great, as was the beach attendant's service in setting up lounge chairs, tables, and towels. Room was very clean and nicely decorated.

Reviews.Title: “Favorite Place to Stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: theartistinme
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Key West off and on for the last 17 years and I always stay here. It is beautiful and right in the heart of all the activity in Key West. I recently had my wedding there and it was so perfect and beautiful on their beach. The staff was super helpful with our event and made the day perfect. I will always stay at Pier House and recommend that you do to!

Reviews.Title: “First time to Key West and I was spoiled!”
Reviews.Author: coryswartz
Reviews.Content: My wife has been to Key West many times and always stayed at the Pier House. This was my first time there and it's going to be hard for any other places to match it. The private beach (which we got married on) was awesome, especially to wind down on with a beer and cigar after few of the nights on Duval Street. The rooms have all been renovated are all very clean and the decor is great. The staff was very helpful in making sure our guests all received their favors. It was a very enjoyable experience and I'm already looking forward to going back!

Reviews.Title: “We Loved The Pier House!”
Reviews.Author: Elaine027
Reviews.Content: The Pier House was great! The location was perfect. It was right at the end of Duval Street so were were able to get to all of the shops and restaurants in the area and we also were near the water. In addition to the pool, the hotel had its own little beach. The hotel grounds were covered with lush green plants which gave it a very tropical feeling. The room was very clean and well decorated with comfortable beds and a spacious bathroom. It gave the feeling of being on a southern plantation. We also had a private balcony overlooking a fish pond. When we checked in we found a tray with fruit, nuts and snacks for us to enjoy. We had lunch or breakfast at the restaurant and the food was good served by pleasant waiters. All of the staff members at the Pier House were pleasant and very helpful. I really enjoyed our stay and would go there again if I travel back to Key West!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and staff”
Reviews.Author: jdmoses
Reviews.Content: Pier House was everything we were expecting. Room was nice. We had basic room and it was fine for what we wanted. Location is perfect. Beach was great, as most places in KW don;t have one. Service from the staff was great. Grounds were well kept. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Not what we expected”
Reviews.Author: Speere
Reviews.Content: Having heard great things about the Pier House we were greatly disappointed. The room was dark and noisy (generator under the terrace). Air conditionings are also extremely old fashioned and noisy. We had two more or less sleepness nights. The private beach is a tiny stretch of sand. We preferred to use the public beach instead. Location is great, at the quiet end of Duval Street. Even when taking the generally high prices on Key West into account, we would not return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time”
Reviews.Author: samdog1
Reviews.Content: The Pier House was great. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. The room was very nice, big, comfortable bed, extremely clean and well maintained. They have their own private beach which is great to have when you have been walking the street all day. The location is perfect. Will stay here again on my next return.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: Kulasox
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here from June 8-13. We have stayed here before, and will never stay anywhere else! The beach front property is great, and the proximity to Mallory Square and Duval St. is amazing. The staff at the beach bar were great, remembered our names and orders, and the service at the pool and the beach was awesome. Our room was always cleaned quickly in the morning, and we loved our balcony. I can't say enough great things about this hotel! The bartender at the beach bar who is originally from Gloucester, MA was the best!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Room Security was rude...”
Reviews.Author: ScottStarr
Reviews.Content: We spent a long weekend away in key west with 5 other couples. We checked on their site ahead of time and didn't see any restrictions for the pool, or their beach. No where do they post signs that show no outside coolers, or beverages. So of course we rolled in a cooler to the place with plenty of our own beverages. We were not bothered the first day and we ran up a 400.00 bar tab along with out own alcohol we had. Day 2 the security guy comes up with a massive attitude and told us that we had to move the cooler or leave the pool area. Now I am not upset about the part of taking the cooler out of the pool area...I understand that they need to make money to stay afloat but there is a nice way and a totally wrong way to deal with the situation. We told the security person that everyone there had coolers and we didn't know the hotel had a rule against them...so we moved the cooler away to the parking area and left it next to or car ( this was in sight of our pool chairs.) just out of spite we kept going to our cooler to grab beers filling up our plastic cups and walking back to the pool. the security guard went and took the cooler and locked it in his office. ( we witnessed him taking it) so we went to the front desk asked if they would return our 50.00 rolling cooler that security took. They called the security guard on duty he claimed he had no clue....this is not how you take care of people that are spending over 4500.00 a night in rooms and over 400.00 a day in a bar tab... To shorten he story as soon as this moron left for the day they found our cooler in his office and returned it to us. We purposely did not eat at the hotel after that ( 20 people each day for breakfast and no lunch at the pool) We did drink there at the pool but we did everything we could from that point on not to spend money there....loved the Hotel but the jest of this complaint is in the future they need to explain that customer service is an important part of customer satisfaction even by the security guy. We were rowdy having a great time...and were asked about the cooler 2 nights later at the beach by a much smarter guy....We were all drinking on the beach, swimming and having a good time. The night security guy walked up and asked us to please remove the cooler from the beach because of safety reasons. We could take it back to our room, store it in the hallway and he even asked if he could get us some plastic cups from behind the bar... If this would have been the way we were treated from the first encounter we would have given it 5 stars! Its too bad one bad apple spoiled the whole bunch but that is just how it works!

Reviews.Title: “The ONLY place to stay in the Keys!”
Reviews.Author: JGPLove
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this resort since I was a child (30 years!!) and truly feel there is no other place to stay in Key West. If you can, splurge on an Ocean Front room but know the resort is well worth it even without. The feel is upscale, tropical and yet relaxing all in one and the private beach/ ocean access are the best/ only you will find on the island! I could honestly say the property offers enough amenities to ralely need to venture out. I LOVE The Pier House!!

Reviews.Title: “Loved oceanfornt room, will stay here again”
Reviews.Author: Kjaye1
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the hotel and were promptly taken to the room we had booked, which had a patio on the tropical garden courtyard where the pool, bar, restaurants, etc. are. Just out of curiosity, the next day we asked if there were any upgrades available, and we were moved to an oceanfront room (with balcony and more room) at a better rate than found online. Very satisfied with the room quality, restaurant food, pool, and especially the private beach. This is one of the best hotels in Key West, and we will definitely stay here again. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “There really is no place else to stay”
Reviews.Author: phil753
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th trip to Key West and our 4th stay at the Pier House. The facilities, the staff, customer service, location...all excellent. The grounds are beautiful and both the grounds and the buildings are well maintained. We have stayed in the Traditional, the Lanai, the Caribbean Spa, Oceanview with Balcony, and the Dockside Suites, you cannot go wrong. On two occasions our flight was delayed or changed and the staff was able to help us continue our stay. Our only problem was on the 3rd trip we had a noisy a/c and they changed our room (upgraded) with no problem. The Pier House has it's own beach which is wonderful! It is only steps to Mallory Square and all of the excitement of Duval Street. If you want a truly special and memorable stay in Key West, you cannot beat the Pier House! We are already planning our return trip!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place, we will return!”
Reviews.Author: TheDugger
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in nice hotels from Florida to Hawaii to Mexico and I can say this is a fantastic hotel. It's not the Boca Raton Beach Club, but it's not trying to be either. It's simply the best place to stay while in Key West. The place is clean, staff is polite and hotel location is the best on the island. Our bags were delivered to our room, our beach attendant set up our lounge chairs and spread our towels for us, and lastly our pool waitress brought us our drinks and delivered poolside. So, great hotel, reasonable price, great amenities, AWESOME location! I don't understand some of the negative reviews, I guess some people just always have to find something to complain about. We will return to Pier House and would recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: “One of the Best Resorts We've Been To”
Reviews.Author: nannerp
Reviews.Content: We chose this resort to celebrate our 10th anniversary, so we had a lot of high hopes that it would live up to our expectations. We were not disappointed at all, in fact, it was exactly what we had wanted. The location is perfect. You're close to the action, but far enough removed to get away from it when you want to. The resort has its own private beach which is very nice and generally not crowded, which we expected coming on Memorial Day weekend. The walkways are surrounded by beautiful, tropical gardens and the staff goes out of their way to be helpful. Our room was a King with bay view, and it was large, well decorated with an amazing view. We also ended up in one of the standard atrium king rooms when we missed our flight and needed to stay an extra night. Needless to say we couldn't think of anywhere else we would rather stay on the island than here and the staff immediately welcomed us back. We opted for the cheaper room since we only needed it before our flight the next morning, but even this room was great and turned what could have ended up being a rough day into another relaxing day in paradise. This was truly the dream vacation we had dreamed about and any time we come back to Key West, we will be staying at Pier House.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed the beach”
Reviews.Author: pucgal
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed swimming in the water at the Pier House private beach. It was the best ocean experience ever around the island. Our room was nicely decorated and had quality amenities. Our garden room had a cement box for a balcony that trapped the heat and was very uncomfortable, couldn't see out when sitting down and it had no air movement. We had great service in the Chart Room, and at the coffee shop. Breakfast on the harbor was very enjoyable. We felt the rest of the meals were mediocre. The grounds are superior to any of the other accommodations on that side of the island. It's a little bit of paradise in the middle of the hubbub.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME”
Reviews.Author: JPatton
Reviews.Content: Great location -- close to restaurants and private at the same time. Beautiful beach area with good food and drink service. Plan to stay here when I visit Key West next time!

Reviews.Title: “I couldn't have asked for a better honeymoon!”
Reviews.Author: ReginaTravels
Reviews.Content: From the moment we arrved at Pier House and checked in, we knew it would be a special trip. We were upgraded to a beautiful and spacious suite in the spa building, which made the stay that much more enjoyable. (Note: LOVE the showers in the spa building rooms). We had heard that Key West can be a little 'crazy', which we aren't entirely opposed to, but after the stress of wedding planning and the wedding as a whole, we just wanted to relax by the time we arrived. We were easily able to do this since the hotel is nicely tucked away from Duval, but close to everything it has to offer. We were able to take advantage of the amenities at the hotel itself before venturing out to see the rest of what Key West had to offer by spending time sitting out on our balcony, heading to the private beach, beach bar and grill, and spending nights at the pool. I love that the beach and pool are open 24/7 and provide drink service--Excellent pina coladas! The concierge was very helpful in finding us a wind and wine sunset sail and a snorkel trip to fit our needs and price goals. The hotel as a whole was VERY accomodating in providing the extra room ammenities that our friends and family purchased off the honeymoon we created with the help of the concierge via e-mail prior to the wedding. We asked them to spread out the delivery of some of these ammenities, and they did a fantastic job keeping us excted about what would be waiting for us in our room upon our return. Room service meals were quickly delivered and wonderful--Conch chowder=Heaven. I truly could not have asked for a more relaxing, but fun, honeymoon! We will absolutely be returning!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return.”
Reviews.Author: Parisbyday2
Reviews.Content: We arrived early and checked in to see if our room happened to be ready. Our room was still in the process of being cleaned but a suite was available so they upgraded our room. What a treat this was!! The room was spotless and tastefully decorated. A five minute walk took us to Mallory Square where we watched a beautiful sunset. Kudos to the wonderful staff for making our stay exceptional!

Reviews.Title: “Only place to stay in Key West...”
Reviews.Author: rtsunset
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at The Pier House May 18-23 for our 10th anniversary. We both had been to Key West many times but never stayed in a hotel, only condos. This time, we decided to finally stay at the end of Duval Street and just enjoy ourselves. All I can say is next time we come to Key West , we WILL be staying once again at The Pier House!! Located right in the center of all the things to do, yet once on the grounds, everything seems so far away and it's peaceful and quiet. We stayed in a Traditional King room and it was very large and plenty of room. Nicely decorated and a large balcony as well. I had read a few "bad" reviews about the hotel but all I can say to those people is... WTF are you talking about? Rooms were very clean, entire grounds were manicured and beach/pool was well maintained. The cleaning staff deserves MUCH credit as our room was taken care of every day and we both were surprised with a turndown service each night. Chocolate hits the spot when you are coming in late from Duval Street. :) We were close to the marina (only a 10 minute walk) for our boat excursions and Mallory Square was also 5 minutes away. CVS is right across the street for anything you forgot or need. We got this thing called "The Key West Bar Card" - well worth the $20.00 and a lot of the bars that gave the 2 for 1 discounts were all within 2 blocks of the resort, two right across the street. There are even two bars at The Pier House that allow you use of the card as well. This even counts for the pool/beach waitress, as every day she was always there checking up on us in a timely manner and we got 4 drinks for the price of two with the cards. We also went to a lot of bars I'd never even thought of going to (until I bought the bar card) and we discovered some new hang outs just off Duval. Great time at all the bars. I can't express in words what a wonderful time we both had for our anniversary and The Pier House made it special for us. Gone are the days of renting a condo up the street - from now on, it's The Pier House for us when we come back in the Fall.

Reviews.Title: “You can not beat this location.”
Reviews.Author: hsmayhew
Reviews.Content: This is my third time staying at the Pier House, and will 100% be back. When we arrived, someone was right out to get our bags, and check in was quick and easy. I have only stayed in the basic room and it has been fine. All the rooms have been updated, and have nice bathrooms. Never had a housekeeping issue, our room was always clean when we came back. One day we said we didn't need service, but the housekeeper made sure we had clean towels and told use if we changed our mind, just to let her know. The pool and beach area is small, but it really is all you need. My husband and I like the feel of a smaller hotel rather then a large resort. The bartender at the beach bar was very friendly as so was the waitresses on the beach. The food at the beach bar, in my opinion, is the best around for bar type food. The blacked Mai sandwich and Conch firtters are really good!! The drink menu is a little boring, but not a big deal, they have a full bar and can make anything. One of the days we were there, the power went out on the island, and it seemed like everyone at the hotel was either at the pool or beach, and the beach bar staff worked very hard and fast to make sure everyone was getting drinks. The hotel has a full spa, which I have been to every time I come, and have always enjoyed my services. But without a doubt, you simply can not beat the location of this hotel. If you want to be at the foot of all the action of duval street, yet still want some quite time to relax, then stay here, you will be happy you did. My husband and I did not get into a car for 3 days! There is a CVS right across the street that we went to everyday it seemed for odds and ends. We also went out on a boat one day, and due to the location of the hotel, we could walk to the marina. There are other nice hotels in the same area, but you do not get the privacy like you do at Pier House. We also had friends join us on this trip, and they enjoyed the Pier House as well. I look forward to coming back next year.

Reviews.Title: “This is the perfect spot with everything you need in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: FLKeysdaydreamin
Reviews.Content: The Pier House has got it all. Clean and updated rooms, friendly staff, privacy while still in the heart of downtown/Duval Street, on the ocean, private beach.....need I say more??!! There is a small pub on site, a great tiki bar that will serve you while at the pool or beach, a restaraunt with great food (never had a bad meal), great spot for sunsets. The property is very spacious and for those of you that like to work out or pamper yourself there is a great fitness center and a spa. We have stayed there 3 tims now and love it!

Reviews.Title: “One of the most disappointing resort stays ever!”
Reviews.Author: daiseylyn1
Reviews.Content: To start, no valet! The security guard brought the bags up because no one was around to do so. The messed up our spa appointment then blaimed us for the mistake and was not accommidating in rescheduling so we cancelled all together. The staff acted like it was in inconveniance to serve you, that is if the ever did! We were with friend for a special occasion and romantic weekend and were told no or was treated badly by the staff. My fiance served our drinks at the pool since the waitress felt it wasn't important. My friend asked for icewater and was direscted to a water cooler in the corner of the pool area but practcally had to beg for a cup of ice. The second day I got sick from the food I ordered at the outside bar and was in the room all night Friday. The drinks (when we could get them) were watered down after the first one. There was no water or mini bar in the room and was told if we wanted some we would have to order roomservice during thier hours of business. That is if you could reach them. If you couldn't get through or not during thier hours you had to leave the hotel and go to cvs. Our friends had a massage friday and enjoyed it, they rebooked for the next day (strange seeing we couldn't get another app. at the same time). They also invited a friend from another hotel for a massage as well and all three were terrible. Two different irons didn't work and stained my friend s dress. There was no music at the pool and the pool was dirty. All of us that went on that trip are in the hospitality business and was mortified by the lack of care. I would never advise anyone to go to this hotel. I can't figure out who would rate this sterile looking and disappointing hotel 5 stars! By whose standards!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, average room and stellar price for anywhere but Key West.”
Reviews.Author: Metfromwv
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned from 6 days/5 nights at the Pier House. The location is perfect, being right between the waterfront area, Mallory Square and Duval St. That said, I've never paid $500.00 a night for such an average room--not even in Manhattan. Some of the handles on the dresser had broken off and/or were missing, the room had only a shower (no tub), and the bed and furniture looked beat up and ready to be replaced. The food at the hotel was OK but I would suggest eating at one of the many fine restaurants in town. I don't mean to nit-pick because this really is a decent place but $500/night is $500/night and JUST because the is Key West should not justify this level of mediocrity for the money. Consider shopping around. You might do better AND get a free continental breakfast like they still do at Days Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Just what the doctor ordered”
Reviews.Author: Oshow703
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just enjoyed the best week of our lives at the Pier House and Key West. We have traveled extensively across North America and this experience ranks at the top. From the moment we were greeted at the door to checkout, everything was topnotch. It truly made our 25th anniversary celebration a special time!! Our checkin went smoothly and the process took no time at all. We found our room to be be more than adequate for our needs. Our room was cleaned regularly and as requested on days when asked for special service. We especially enjoyed the towel sculptures left on the bed along with the chocolates. We were also given our choice of a bottle of wine or champagne as a gift for our 25th. The grounds were maintained to perfection and the pool and beach areas, although on the small side, were large enough to never feel over crowded. There was never a shortage of beach chairs or towels. The wait staff was exceptional as was their service. We especially enjoyed the Chart Room and Mike made us feel right at home. He is quite an exceptional bartender as well as very enjoyable to talk to. K thoroughly enjoyed the popcorn and peanuts, but she really had a hard time throwing the waste on the floor! We hope to return next year to celebrate K's 50th, but don't tell her I said so!!

Reviews.Title: “Good but...”
Reviews.Author: ssssss_11
Reviews.Content: Good location although the other part of Duval is nicer, less drunk types wandering the street and the tacky tourist stuff is annoying. Still very quiet for this part of the town and the small private beach is welcome.....also free wifi and parking, a huge bonus. You can walk to most anywhere from here. bring your walking shoes and your spray bottle for the heat. If you go off the beaten track on simonton or near truman annex it will be a welcome relief, shops and restos are on either side of duval. One weird thing...Today our room didn't get cleaned, no real problem, just called in about 1/2 hour before dinner to say we'd be away for 2 hours or more.... Still not cleaned. The kicker was that whomever came to give me new towels absolutely refused to take the old ones and said to leave them....(with who???). Sort of strange. Otherwise, decent, value hotel. I think their biggest issues is the less than cheesy location. And they should have better music piped in at beach bar. It's just local radio. Could be much better.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: doctkc
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend staying at The Pier House in Key West. We stayed last year at the Ocean Key Resort across the street and really liked it but the rooms were so small and you had to pay for parking. The Pier House room was twice the size (and cost less) and the porch was big and spacious. We had a garden view room and it was really nice and quiet. The bathroom was huge and the shower was really nice. I loved that I could chose when housekeeping would clean the room. We changed it daily to accomodate our excursions. The food and drinks were really good. We had no problem getting chairs at the pool. There was a bike rack to lock your bikes up to. We had no problem with noise. There is a topless beach but we didn't see anyone using it and it is secluded from the rest of the resort. The location is prime in Key West. Todd helped us with dinner recommendations and set up our snorkeling and jet ski trips. This will be the only place we stay in Key West from now on!

Reviews.Title: “Simply the BEST, the only hotel we will stay at in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: RNMommy120
Reviews.Content: This hotel is simply great! I could not have asked for anything more during my stay. The rooms are beautiful and new, and the grounds are spectacular as well. This was my second stay, and I have to say it was even better than the first. The pool area and bar are great as well. The location of the Pier House could not be any better. Just off Duval St and close to all the great bars! I cannot say enough about how wonderful this place is. We will definitely being staying here on all of our future trips to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous hotel with a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: lkdulle
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed in a garden room at the Pier House in late March, 2011. We drove from Miami International Airport and arrived just after sunset. The gracious staff directed us to our room which we found to be clean and spacious. Our room overlooked the gardens and the beds were comfortable. We ate at the hotel our first night and found it expensive for drinks and snacks but we enjoyed the music. We spent some time on the very small beach the next day. It's a tiny beach but the attendant made us comfortable. There is no trouble getting towels to use on the beach or take on boat trips. We visited the spa and found it to be very professional with excellent therapists and a wide range of services. I'd go back anytime!

Reviews.Title: “absolute ahhh!”
Reviews.Author: kbcadd
Reviews.Content: My Husband and I have been to Key West many times over the past 20 years, so we are familiar with the island. We have almost always stayed on the other side of the island which is rather remote. This was our first stay at pier House, and we could not have been more pleased, with everything! We only had 3-1/2 days to spend there and that was too short. We had requested a Lanai room, second floor, and it was really perfect. The property has heavy foliage all over. It is so beautiful and provides great privacy on the balcony. We had breakfast at the Harbor Side Cafe each morning, everything was so delicious. We had terrific service from check in to check out. I loved being able to get up each morning and walk around old town watching the place wake up. We really enjoyed drinks and food at the Beach Bar late in the day. The private beach and pool are very nice. You will be very happy if you choose this resort. We will definitely return at our next opportunity! Kudos to the entire staff there.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed with our highly anticipated resort”
Reviews.Author: majmac1
Reviews.Content: The lovely Pier House in Key West was to be our great extravagance for our Florida getaway. The photos of the rooms, amenities and location seemed perfect. However, our room was small and right near the office and elevator. During our 2 nights stay we heard what sounded like a heard of elephants right outside our door all night long-both nights. So noisy and yet the room was charming with its 4 poster beds, plantation shutters, modern bath and private patio. We mentioned the problem to the desk staff upon departure but they took no interest in our problem. What a disappointment for a high end property like Pier House! If you stay there, ask to see the room first. If it is near an elevator, just know that it will be noisy all night long. No carpet. Just tile and no accoustics! They need to put carpet in the hallways to make for a more restful night for all guests. The best part of Pier House is Bill who works security at the front parking lot! He helped us by providing us with a list of the best places in town for food and beverage. Superb guy who was a great ambassador for Pier House and Key West!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location and what a view”
Reviews.Author: Kretschm1
Reviews.Content: We were fortunate enough to recently spend 3 days at the Pier House Resort. We had a queen sized bed with an ocean front view, what a view!!! The front desk staff was friendly and efficient at check in as was any dealings we had with the parking lot security. Housekeeping kept our room immaculate. Can't say anything about the restaurant or concierge because we did not have any dealings with them. Beautifully landscaped grounds, pool area looked inviting although we did not get a chance to use it. The best thing about the Pier House is the location, it is at the very end of Duval Street, maybe a 5 minute walk to Mallory Square where everyone goes for sunset celebration each evening. Plenty of restaurants, bars and shopping within a quick stroll. Spring Break was in full swing but you would not know by how quiet it was in our room.

Reviews.Title: “Most Enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: Ogsplash
Reviews.Content: We had a Harbor Loft Suite which was very comfortable and well appointed except for storage space. Bed was very comfy and the living area a good area to chill - not that we spent much time there with so much to do and see in Key West. Staff were very attentive and friendly. We could have spent another week there - easily!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location and nice room with good view!”
Reviews.Author: stephvaca
Reviews.Content: Had a great oceanfront room. Nice size room with comfortable king bed. The best part was the location, right at the end of Duval St., but far enough away so that you could not hear all the action! Walking distance to most locations. Small beach area, but well kept. Would definately stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location for KW fun”
Reviews.Author: Toby_Kenobi
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel with excellent KW location. Close to many activities and shops. Easy walk to most downtown KW locations. Enjoyed to hotel - service was very good, room was excellent with nice view and privacy. We enjoyed to Yoga on the beach during the visit. Did not spend much time at the pool or beach but both looked very nice. Big waterfront area with plenty of room for swimming. I would recommend this location

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: joedoe587
Reviews.Content: This is in the heart of Key West, very quiet yet steps from the sunset pier, the craziness of Duval St., and many of the tourist attractions Our room had a very small balcony overlooking the inner courtyard and its jungle-like landscaping. It was roomy, nicely designed and very clean, with good beds and showers, and free amenities, such as parking, newspapers, and upscale toiletries. The location no doubt makes it fairly pricey. The hotel restaurant is blandly designed but the food is quite good. There is a small but very nice pool, a beach, and nice amenities overall. (Unfortunately, I find Key West, despite its many charms, growing more and more red-necky: Bad C&W music and too many amateur drunken middle-aged women in the bars.)

Reviews.Title: “Awesome location!!!!”
Reviews.Author: JAmerican2
Reviews.Content: At Pier House, you are basically paying a pretty penny for the location! We had a harborview room, so we had a great view of the ocean! The hotel is at the end of Duval on the water, so you are in the heart of everything, without the noise of Duval Street! I didn't find the concierge to be very helpful. I ended up making reservations myself & just asked him to confirm my reservations. Instead of finding someone to make birthday cupcakes for my husband, he gave me the number of a company. I think he should have gotten the info for me, instead of me having to do the legwork. I ended up making my own phone calls & inquiries, then made my own arrangements. The one thing he was supposed to do was make sure there were matches in the room-I ended up having to call down to the lobby for them to bring me matches. I think the main purpose of their concierge is to make sure you purchase extra excursions through them. The emails start coming a week or 2 before you arrive, trying to entice you. Most things you can book yourself anyway & probably save time & some money. Not to mention that there is noone keeping up with the concierge's email when he is out of town, so I ended up making several phone calls, before being told that he just got back. As for the hotel room, everything was clean & well appointed with a flat screen TV in the room & bathroom. The walls are very thin though. At one point I felt the next door guests were entering our room, when really they were just opening their closet. We heard practically every word of their conversation! The rain shower head in the shower was awesome! Nice & hot water, with lovely tiling in the shower stall! Parking was great at the hotel, so we never had a problem! I would stay here again, but would also stay at the Hyatt next door, which is also in a great location!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Place”
Reviews.Author: TheFeesh
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for two days in february. Our room wasnt ready and they gave us a oceanview room which was amazing. Our friends were jealous! Really great staff, and you couldnt be closer to the action in key west,. beautiful location

Reviews.Title: “Go to the Pier House to escape NY snow and cold!!!”
Reviews.Author: 10acious1
Reviews.Content: Our January/February week long get away could not have come at a better time! Leaving 2'+ of NY snow and frigid temperatures for a week at the Pier House in Key West was much awaited and truly gratifying once we arrived! The Pier House is ideally situated right at the end of Duval Street. It is really the perfect location for all the Key West day and night activity and of course the incredible sunsets! The hotel is clean, with large rooms, comfortable beds, and offers several restaurants, bars, a pool, a small gym, and a lovely little man made beach area. The staff are pleasant and eager to help.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: 4caseys
Reviews.Content: Our stay at The Pier House in January was excellent. The location, room, amenities and service were great. No complaints. Expensive, but worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Efficient and well situated hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wabamik
Reviews.Content: Right downtown with a small beach, this hotel is comfortable, with great views from ocean view rooms but has a blandness about the dining areas and an odd cool impersonal efficiency about it. Having said that everything we asked for was done willingly. Rooms are comfortable enough but for the price I expected a bathtub as well as a shower. A tropical rain shower never drained off our balcony making it unusable after the rain, a pity as it was the perfect place to relax. You have to go out to get to the restaurant but no umbrellas are provided so bring your own. The beach is tiny but service there good. The location gives it an edge over other resorts, near to the Harbour restaurants and the action downtown but insulated in lovely tropical gardens in the grounds. We would return here.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: huskyhoops
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Pier House for a week in August. During my first visit to Key West, I had noticed the Pier House and thought it would be a great place to stay. It exceeded my expectations in every way imaginable. The location right at the end of Duval Street can't be beaten - not to mention the free on-site parking. The Pier House is easily located within stumbling distance from several of our favorite spots. We stayed in a basic room, which didn't have much of a view, and we understood that going in. The room was certainly large enough for the two of us, the bedding was great, and the bathroom was nice and spacious as well. The on-site amenities, including the Chart Room bar, restaurant, and little private beach were all great to have. We also had time to enjoy the pool. The layout of the resort, although compact, is well thought out. We found staff to be very helpful and friendly. We are going back to KW at the end of the year, and know exactly where we want to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Privacy and great location.”
Reviews.Author: pamperedPennsylvania
Reviews.Content: Pier House was a great place to stay. The location is central to everything in Key West. The rooms are large and nicely decorated. It was very private and we hardly knew anyone else was there. The grounds are secluded and the property spotless. The restaurant had great food and a wonderful view. The spa services were great and the employees there very accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “A delightful respite at the very end of Duval Street”
Reviews.Author: mchasej
Reviews.Content: This hotel was just what we needed after a long drive to Key West. At the end of Duval street this medium size hotel is designed to provide quite escape from the wild side of Key West. Many rooms open into the center area that has wonderful lush landscaping, a great pool and a private beach. The chair and towel boy is just about a pleasant and attentive as is humanly possible. Every other staff member we met was super pleasant. The finishes were great, modern fixtures, great bathrooms and wonderful beds make this place a great bargain in a city with few. We never ate here as there is so much good food just a short walk away. The only real let down was the coffee, it was a lame attempt at brewing espresso.

Reviews.Title: “Best Honeymoon ever, Thanks to the Peir House”
Reviews.Author: toniapt
Reviews.Content: This review is coming a little late, it's been busy since our wedding. We found the Peir House by luck and the good reviews it received on TripAdvisor. When we checked in we were immediately upgraded to the Lanai room which was beautifully decorated, very clean, and our private garden patio was perfect for just the two of us. Everyone from the front desk/concierge to the gardeners to the restraunt and bar staff couldn't have be kinder or more pleasant. The pool, beach, bars, room quaulity and food made it hard to leave for the first three days. We decided to stay an extra two days and were then upgraded to the harbor view room which made our stay even better. Great location too. Can't imagine ever staying any where in Key West again. Can't say enough good things about Peir House!

Reviews.Title: “Zero customer servixe”
Reviews.Author: miketraveler44
Reviews.Content: This hotel could not have a better location, and it's a good thing because that's the only thing keeping them in business. The normal rooms are average while the dockside suites have the best views on the island. You would think guests paying the outrageously high price to stay in their elite rooms, would be treated like valued guests. That is simply not the case. We stayed in the dockside suite and left after one night. The view from the balcony is great, however there is a public area under the balcony where any drunks can watch the sunset. Hotel did nothing about it. We left and went next door to the Hyatt. Loved it there. If you do not care about how you're treated and don't mind paying high dollar for horrible treatment, then this hotel is great. The whole staff needs a customer service class.

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kcurry0rlando
Reviews.Content: What a great location. On the water, at the end of Duval Street in the middle of everything. The staff was friendly, the rooms superb, resturants good. This hotel is "the Place to Stay".

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: jrnorthport
Reviews.Content: We had a great room with a gulf view. Probably one of the best locations in Key West

Reviews.Title: “The Gold Standard”
Reviews.Author: Iron_Mike44
Reviews.Content: Pier House simply caters to your every need, enough said

Reviews.Title: “Loud”
Reviews.Author: Portland_ORDdb
Reviews.Content: This hotel was in a great location, had a great little beach, beachside bar and restaurant but it was loud. Due to the interior courtyards and slate floors all sounds echo and bounce right into your room - at all hours of the night. We got a traditional Lanai room so Iâ€™m sure that their more expensive rooms are not facing these loud courtyards. Staff was just okay and bar staff seemed to be in a bad mood - not friendly at all.

Reviews.Title: “Relax on coolers on the beach”
Reviews.Author: Ljones74
Reviews.Content: Overall great hotel and location. Stayed last year and had no issues bringing our backpack cooler on the beach. We still ordered plenty of food and drinks from the hotel. However this year we were told no coolers on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but even better service”
Reviews.Author: emtnurse
Reviews.Content: A group of four booked two 'traditional' rooms on line with no problem. Drove down from South Beach with early check in @ 11 am. Rooms clean, nicely furnished and with comfortable beds. There is a wide range of rooms and prices available to fit every budget so you'll need to decide if premium rates is worth the water view. The private beach and pool with hot tub is easily reached from all rooms. We had done research and this is the best location if you want to be in the middle of the action but still want privacy. The staff are the best and free parking is a find. Did not eat at the restaurants but the bars are generous with their pours. I find this to be the quant essential Key West experience at its best.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: wisconchsinite
Reviews.Content: The service was great from the time our cab arrived until the time our cab pulled away, we LOVED it. The private beach and surroundings, within walking distance to everything, the food, the spa, the whole atmosphere was excellent. I would suggest a broom in the room for the sand factor, but otherwise a certainly memorable and recommendable great time.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay in Key West!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Wendooshka
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Pier House for 3 nights, and this resort is fabulous!!! I can't think of a single thing that I could say that wasn't terrific. From the time we checked in, we were treated absolutely amazing. Our room was ready early and were able to check in around 11:30 am. The room was one of the best we've ever stayed in. The bed was comfy, the decor was lovely, the bathroom and shower were very up-to-date....the shower had a rainshower head. There was turndown service at night with chocolates on the pillows. The resort was right where you want to be in Key West....it's at the end of Duval St. so we were able to just park the car and walk. Tons of bars and restaurants. Also, tons of shopping!!! Mallory Square was a 2 minute walk where there were lots of street vendors and performers. Check out the fellow who sings and his dog takes money from your hand and puts it in a tin!!!! The resort is right on the water and there is a small beach with a dock you can swim out to. There is food and bar service on the beach as well the Tiki Bar and the Harborside Cafe. The staff is so helpful and very friendly.....I would recommend this Hotel to anyone! Had a great time and hope to visit again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to spend your time Key West”
Reviews.Author: billnjax
Reviews.Content: My wife and I always spend the week of our anniversary on the beach somewhere in Florida. This year, it was our time to return to key West. Normally, we do not stay in the heart of Old Town, but decided that this year we would. Looking at the choices, we felt that the Pier House offered the best value for the money. You are at the center of Old Town, Key West with just a short walk to Mallory Square and the Conch Tour train depot is right on the corner. The day before we left Jacksonville, I decided that I would order some roses to be delivered to the room, I called the concierge desk and they put me in contact with Adele of the Pier House Staff. She sent me names of recommended vendors and I had the roses delivered to the Hotel on Saturday. The staff took care of the rest. I can not say enough good things about everyone we encountered. They were always friendly and helpful. When Key West next comes up in our travel rotation, you can be sure we will stay at the Pier House. Give them a try, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great location at a good price.”
Reviews.Author: FrUsa1991
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel at a fair price. The location is outstanding being at the best end of Duval St. We rented a scooter near the hotel entrance which was nice since it was easy to park and not too expensive. We stayed in a "Lanai" room on the first floor which was not worth the extra expense since it was not covered and lacked any privacy or view. If you go with a Lanai room demand a second floor or higher else go with the less expensive room.

Reviews.Title: “You can't beat the location of this...”
Reviews.Author: GreenKeys
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the location of this place. Right off Duval, steps from all the action but definitely still secluded enough to avoid noise issues. Room was decent size- queen size bed with seperate sitting area that included couch, chairs. Flat screen TV. Nice shower and bathroom. Room was very clean. Small balcony with nice chairs. Small beach with roped off swimming area. Pretty good for KW realatively speaking. Drink service on the beach was weak (very slow). Better off going up to the beach bar yourself to order. Towel/lounge guy on beach was awesome- hard worker and always smiling. Drinks and food at beach bar were quality. Steer clear of the Chart room (other hotel bar). Total dive- extremely small, dirty, creepy and filled with smoke and no ventilation. Pool is ok- only went in once late at night. Open 24 hours, which is nice. No pool bar. Grounds of hotel are kept very nice. Had a late flight so they allowed us to check out late free of charge. Free parking. I'd say this is the spot to stay if youre headed to KW. Can't beat it. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: Rainstorm
Reviews.Content: I loved the Pier House. We had a King Room with a view of the Pier and water. Great for people watching and sunsets. Enjoyed the music and ambiance from our balcony . The room was very tastefully renovated - Thought I was at the Ritz! lol Grounds, Pool, restaurants, bars were great. The location is right in the heart of everything making it easy to come and go all day long. The parking is free and this is a really important feature! Will be coming back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: MICHIGAN8244
Reviews.Content: My son and I stayed here Aug 17th thru Aug 19th, and we absolutly loved this Hotel. We are definitely coming back again. We had a room with two double beds with a pool view, everything was clean and very up to date, from the bathroom to the very spacious rooms. The beach and the pool were just awesome, loved the restaurant too, try the Lobster BLT Sliders!

Reviews.Title: “Best Location, Staff, Rooms and Beach.”
Reviews.Author: Navy84
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Key West. Pier House was an awesome stay. We went down for one night (Aug 17th) but enjoyed the hotel and location so much we stayed for 2 nights total. Located at the end of Duval street, everything is walking distance. Park your car and enjoy. During check in Lee was great and so was Todd the concierge who set me and my family up with a two hour jet ski tour around the island ($60.00 a person) A MUST DO! Mary was great at the beach bar as the Pina Colada's were perfect during the sunset. We stayed in room 412 in the garden area(very peaceful) and the bathroom inspired my wife and I to make some simple upgrades to our own bathroom at home. The Pier House beach was incredible and the staff was very friendly. The pool is 24 hour and the sauna was very pleasant. Free Parking as well. This is a must stay when you go to Key West.. We certainly will make this our home away from home when in the Keys.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location & Resort”
Reviews.Author: Richard W
Reviews.Content: Loved our garden room, King sized bed very comfortable and spacious room. Updated shower and bath. Staff was very nice and friendly. Nice tile floors but they did need cleaning. Had lunch and dinner at the restuarant, both were very good. Great location for dinner as the sun is setting over gulf. The beach area and pool are very nice.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: dreaming27
Reviews.Content: I am the pickiest person ever and I absolutely loved the hotel! I would recommend to anyone. Rooms are roomy, clean, and very spacious. Beach is the beach area in key west. the beach water is super clear...unlike the public beach on key west...ick!!! the pool is nice as well. live music every afternoon. GREAT location as well!!!! I was between this hotel and casa marina and i am soooo happy that i chose this one! You won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: “Pier House is the Best Spot in Key West”
Reviews.Author: keywestgator
Reviews.Content: Two nights were not enough at the Pier House. It was literally paradise. The landscaping was enough to write home about with plush tropical plants throughout the resort but the view of the ocean, on the sunset side of the island, cannot be put into words. We snorkeled just off their beach and watched boats of all sizes go by. Although we didn't go to the spa on this trip, prior visits were excellent. The location was perfect for Lobster Fest, everything was right there within a few blocks. The room was clean, modern and it had a fantastic shower! It was quiet and a perfect romatic getaway.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: sgtema
Reviews.Content: The Pier House is the best place in Key West to stay, the rooms were amazingly clean and spacious with great decor. Right at the end of Duval St. you are close to the action without being in the middle of it. The pier located across the street from the resort is a perfect spot to kick off your night! Great friendly staff and amazing private beach, cannot go wrong with the Pier House!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best views of the Harbour! Gorgeous and great service”
Reviews.Author: TripQueen2
Reviews.Content: The nicest hotel in the Keys! The rooms are gorgeous and have fantastic views of the sunset and water. Great place to snorkel or lounge by their private pool. I would not hesitate to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon at the Pier House”
Reviews.Author: jules16100
Reviews.Content: Location was perfect, right at duval street and mallory square. It was very quiet at night. Food was excellent. They have a great piano bar. You could even do some snorkeling at the beach. At night on the pier you can see dozens of tarpon jumping out of the water, it was fun to watch. Housekeeping will only change sheets every 3 days and towels are only changed if left on the floor! Roosters may wake you up around 8/9am

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: viajeelmundo
Reviews.Content: Second time here and just as good as the first. We had a harborview room overlooking the water. Great to see the boats and sunsets. Our room was a good size with a king bed - very comfortable. Bathroom was a shower stall and looked like it had recently been renovated. They have added flat screen tvs in the bathrooms. The room has a mini-fridge. There is a CVS across the street to buy water and drinks for fridge. Everything was very clean. We had turndown service every night. Parking is free which is great for KW. The cafe by the beach has decent food. The pool is small and crowded with kids. THe beach size is small but for KW a private beach is rare. The water was great!!! Calm and crystal clear. Only disappointment is that there is harldy any shade on beach and they dont have umbrellas for guests. Staff claims its because its too windy and umbrella can fly away. Other hotels on the island offer umbrellas on the beach like Casa Marina and the Reach Resort. The location as mentioned can't be beat. You are in the heart of it all if you stay here. You can walk everywhere. Some good food recommendations: Half Shell Raw Bar Rooftop Cafe AB lobster house

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: tarynD
Reviews.Content: just got back from Pier House. Stayed in Lanai room...the beds were heaven. Loved the beach area, pool was too warm during the day but great at night and open 24H. Location was great walked everywhere. Took the new CityView Trolley and Fury for catamaran ride. Loved walking the boardwalk along the ocean. Great stay at the Peir House and would stay there always the beach was such a plus ! Went to South Beach to watch the great 4th of July Fireworks too

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: fourbehrs
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just returned from Key West. The Pier House was fantastic! The location was the best in the city -- walked everywhere. We stayed in a lanai room which was wonderful. The king size bed was the most comfortable bed ever! The room was so clean and the shower was amazing. This was our first trip to Key and West and are already talking about a return trip. We will definitely stay at the Pier House again. Elvis, the gentleman who was so accommodating at the beach area, was wonderful. He couldn't do enough for us. We are looking forward to our return trip to Key West!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Educator_10
Reviews.Content: Expensive hotel - but what makes it worth it is it's location! Close to the action on Duval Street yet very quiet with a sense of seclusion. Be sure to request the Gulf View - it's worth watching the constant motion of the boats in and out of the nearby marina - plus the sunset view is even better than Mallory Square! The private beach is small yet a fun place to cool off. All employees were nice and helpful, and the entire hotel was immaculate! Will definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: clay_10
Reviews.Content: The pier house is an excellent choice of hotels in Key West. The pool is great, the location is convenient, and the spa services are elegant. The rooms are tiny but I would guess that is standard on this island. The maid services were great, coming back whenever we needed them to. The beds are good quality and the bedding is upscale.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding in every way!”
Reviews.Author: Scott049
Reviews.Content: My wife, two teenage daughters, and I just completed a three-night stay at the Pier House. Our experience was outstanding in every way possible. Often, you look at a hotel on their website and you don't get what you see. In the case of the Pier House, the property is much more beautiful than the few pictures on their website can offer. The entire property is very well kept. The hotel location is perfect. You can walk right off of the hotel property and onto Duval Street. Mallory Square is only a block from the hotel, as is the pier area where one can take advantage of a variety of water sports activities. The rooms have tile floors, contemporary island style furnishings, and upscale bathrooms. We had a waterfront room, and the deck was bigger than some hotel rooms I've stayed in! We dined at two of the restaurants there on the property, and I must say they were both very good. Every member of the hotel staff that I met was extremely professional, nice, and accomodating. The Concierge was available throughout the day to help with the planning of all events and reservations. This was our first experience in Key West, and I can assure you, thanks to the Pier House, I will be planning a return trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and exceptionally clean!”
Reviews.Author: cynwel55
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Pier House with a girl friend the week of 6/7 - 6/11/10. We were a little nervous about any problems with the oil spill but it wasn't in sight! We had the Lanai room overlooking Duvall St and Mallory Sq. - it's not as big as the photo depicts but roomy enough with 2 queen beds. The rooms and grounds were very clean. The Beach is small but nice - they supply chairs, tables & towels. Had breakfast twice in the cafe on the Beach - the eggs benedict were superb! Great Mimosa and Bloody Marys also. The Concierge hooked us up with a Kayak tour. We rented mopeds from the stand in front of the resort - the guy gave us a great deal and very convenient. We ate at Camiles, Bagatelles, Hogs Breath and a burger at Hard Rock. A little muggy this time of year but worth the beautiful waters. Hemmingway House was fun with all the cats. We went on a cool Ghost Tour too.

Reviews.Title: “Key West is the best and the Pier House is where you need to be”
Reviews.Author: paulette90
Reviews.Content: I visited Key West for the first time with my partner and his brother and partner. Lucky for us, his brother had stayed at the Pier House before and knew it was the best location for seeing the sights in Key West. The hotel is lovely, with a small intimate beach. I encourage you to upgrade to a waterview room as it is worth every penny. These rooms have huge terraces which iare perfect for sitting and enjoying the view with a glassof wine. If you are lucky you can even see the occasional cruise ship docked. One word of caution if you are a bath person, most of the rooms have been renovated and the tubs have been removed. Great shower but I did miss my bath. The only complaint I had was the temperature of the pool. It was very, very warm and many people complained but nothing was done. I couldn't understanding why the hotel didn't cool down the temperature of the water by adding cold water. The air temperature was 96 degrees and I'm sure the pool temperature was almost the same. The Pier House is within walking distance to great restaurants and Key West is spectacular! If I'm lucky enough to go back to Key West, the Pier House is where we would stay.

Reviews.Title: “Our New Spot!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: PumRunch9
Reviews.Content: What a treat! My girlfriend and I stayed here in June 2010. We stayed in one of the Caribbean Spa rooms and had the perfect stay. I used the trip to surprise my girlfriend and not only was she surprised, but we are now only staying there moving forward. The location is awesome especially the private beach to cool off and mingle with other guests. The pool looked nice, but we never went in, we had the ocean! The staff made our stay wonderful and Lee in guest services helped me plan a few other surprises while we were there. Don't hesitate to talk to him or Todd to do some special things or setup a few surprises. A few recommendations that we loved as much as the Pier House: SUP Key West - is a tour on a Stand Up Paddle Surfboard, we went all through the mangroves and saw amazing wildlife. Megan the tour guide is amazing and this is hands down the most fun activity we have done in Key West. On to places to eat: Breakfast - Pepe's & Blue Heaven, Lunch - BO's Fish Wagon, Cocktails - Rum Bar @ The Speakeasy & of course the Chart Room, Dinner - Kelly's & Louie's Backyard (Lee or Todd can get a reservation for this one), and Desert - Better Than Sex is a desert bar and if you have a sweet tooth and miss this your crazy! Besides that enjoy Key West, we always do! Oh I almost forgot - BRING OR RENT BIKES - makes it a lot more fun!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous...exceeded my expectations”
Reviews.Author: wendic430
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just returned from a great vacation in Key West and the Pier House was a wonderful place to stay. On Duval, but so quiet you would never know. Beautiful gardens and a great pool. Guests were mature adults and families. Great beach area. We had a traditional room in the Harbour View building--room was good size and the bathroom was really nice with the rain showerhead and even a TV! This was our first visit to Key West and I would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievable Stay at the Pier House!”
Reviews.Author: katybish
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights for his 30th birthday. They upgraded our room at check in and gave us a free bottle of champagne for his bday. The grounds are immaculate, it felt like we were staying at an all-inclusive resort! The beach was amazing, and beach bar was great fun. The bartender there was awesome! We used the pool on the last day, that too was very clean and a waiter came over to get our drink orders. The room was gorgeous, with a view of the water. The bathroom was spacious, it had everything we needed. All the front desk workers were wonderful, and the concierge even helped us try to finagle our airline into changing our flight so we could stay another night! It didn't happen, but we will definitely be back to stay at the Pier House! Also, you can't beat the location, right on Duval, and just a short walk to Mallory Square and the Sunset Celebration!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place - Perfect Location.....”
Reviews.Author: bigwindham
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed our stay last weekend....right in the heart of Duval Street yet quiet and relaxing at the pool and beach. Fun little pool bar with a signer - the rum punch is a must...the suites overlooking the harbor were great. Separately - 2 Friends Patio on Front Street is right across the street - excellant breakfast!!!! We will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous time at Pier House - Don't look anywhere else!!”
Reviews.Author: Meeehhhhhhhh
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a five day girls trip to Key West from May 20 â€“ 25th. Two of the group had stayed here before and thankfully we listened to their suggestion and booked. We couldnâ€™t have found a better place to stay! Service was impeccable especially Linda our waitress at the beach/outdoor restaurant, rooms very nice and the whole complex was kept extremely clean. We took advantage of the beach in the day and the pool late night. No issues of noise from Duval Street at any point on the grounds. Good feedback on the SPA as well. We will book again, and in fact some already have for November.

Reviews.Title: “2nd review..Quiet, but steps from Duval, clean, great food, great service”
Reviews.Author: BeachL0ver77
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights, which was way too short. The hotel was perfect! extremely clean and well maintained, great food, a beautiful beach (which was a pleasant surprise being i was prepared for the "lack of great beaches on key west" as I was told) but it gave me my "fix" when i wanted to lay out. Ironically we found we only layed on our beach for 2 hours during the entire 3 days as we explored all the streets of key west. there's so much to see and so much to do. I owe a great thanks to all the wonderful people on tripadvisor, as the suggestions on things to do and see was spot on. We loved our bartender Brian who sadly is moving back home. he helped us a lot. I highly recommend renting the bicycles...it's a good way to explore the town and burn off the calories from the wine the night before! few key points: great small clean beach and clean beautiful water hotel provides computer to check-in online and print boarding pass service was EXTREMELY nice always greeting you hotel was VERY clean... location is PERFECT..steps from mallory square/sunset festival/ (Roof top cafe is great to eat at) VERY QUIET despite being on top of Duval street. I AM A LIGHT SLEEPER and I swear they must have installed sound proof glass! Enjoy all key west has to offer .....I underestimated how much fun it would be

Reviews.Title: “Awesome resort in Key West!!!”
Reviews.Author: oceanview47
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Pier House in March of this year. Had spa room. Fastastic resort, great rooms, wifi worked great in our building, enjoyed the spa treatments, lounged on the private beach, drank at the bar pool, had breakfast every morning on the deck overlooking the water and the beach. Having stayed at other upper end hotels in Key West, I must say this is the BEST! Service was fantastic, from maids to spa personnel to barmaid to the chair/towel guy on the beach! And the lush greenery was beautiful! Close to everything, yet it's own entity! Will go back again and again and again! Now about that rooster, haha! Well, turn on the A/C FAN in your room and it will drown him out, cause he starts early. Suggest the new cuban restaurant off Mallory (forget name), Turtle Kraals, Alonzo's. Don't forget the conch trolley ride and walks along the marina! And of course Pat Croce's Pirate Museum is a must! The best vacation I've been on in years, I will go back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Impossible to ever think of staying anywhere else in Key West .”
Reviews.Author: shboom
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at The Pier House. We have visited Key West for the past 13 years. Liked many of the fine Hotels we stayed in but now are so spoiled that we don't ever think of staying anywhere else. We missed being there in 2009 because of a serious health problem with my Husband. I had made aout 3 reservations for that year but had to cancel. They were always very gracious when I had to cancel. Finally we were able to go in January this year. I truly believe that the thought of finally being at the Pier House helped keep my Husbands spirits up through a very difficult time. We had booked a room I can't say enough about in Harborview since we loved that location . When we checked in we were told that we had been upgraded to a Dockside suite. We were amazed and delighted since now we have a separate bedroom. I am an early riser and my Husband sleeps, usually, at least an hour or so longer that I do. So it was great to be able to shut off the Bedroom and go into the Living room and out on the Balcony without disturbing him. I did say usually but this time he was up shortly after I was. I think he just couldn't wait to have his coffee on the Balcony and watch all the boat traffic going by. Everything was just perfect. Staff, Restaurant, Wine Bar, etc. Outside Bar is really wonderful. We didn't ever use the pool or the Beach but certainly hope to able to use them next time. I can't say enough about this Hotel. I true resort without the extra resort fees and parking that many other waterfront hotels charge. The old saying that you get what you pay for doesn't hold true here. You really get more than you pay for. I better sign off before I go on and on.

Reviews.Title: “Best Vacation”
Reviews.Author: teeter425
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just returned from our first trip to Key West and we hated to leave. We stayed at the Pier House in one of the Dockside Suites. The room was wonderful. The view we had was unbelievable! The room cost a bit more than what I thought it should be worth. The suite itself was a little small but the balcony and the views were well worth it. The room was very clean and one of the most comfortable beds we have ever had in a hotel. Where are room was located was very quiet and peaceful. The hotel is steps away from Duval St. which was extremely convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tarheeljd
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night - 2 adults and 3 children. We were in one of the suites on the actual pier overlooking the Gulf. Great hotel - right at end of Duval Street - no issues with noise, etc. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I didnt have to leave”
Reviews.Author: jjohn001
Reviews.Content: Had a great time. Staff were great, got upgraded when we arrived. Stayed in the Caribbean spa. Located near all the action and nightlife. Clean rooms and the grounds kept up nice. We will be returning and we are going to tell our friends. If you do the waverunner tour go to Ski Key West at at Gallion. We found those guys the best, friendly and just had a blast.

Reviews.Title: “A beautiful, quiet, friendly place in the middle of the action”
Reviews.Author: joyy74
Reviews.Content: We will never stay anywhere else except the Pier House when we visit Key West! Our room was in a perfect location overlooking the gardens. The bed was very, very comfortable and very clean. We had maid service everyday & turn-down service every evening. We at at the poolside bar once and twice at the Harborview Cafe and had delicious food in both places. The staff was very friendly and always helpful. They had answers for all of our questions, always courteous and always right! We received top-notch service and send them many thanks!!

Reviews.Title: “Once again, the Pier House delivers”
Reviews.Author: Jen3376
Reviews.Content: This is my third time staying at the Pier House resort, and again, it did not disappoint. When checking in, I recieved a bottle of wine and a card that welcomed me back. I thought this was a very nice tough. Check in is a breeze, which is quite nice after that long drive in. It is true, you will pay alot to stay here, but if you know Key West well, you will understand why the prices are so high. It's a small island and prices are high, but you can't go wrong with Pier House. We stayed in the same room as last year, a Harbor view double queen room. rooms are a little tight..but thats only because the beds are so huge and comfortable! We had a huge balcony with great views. Bathrooms are really nice and spa like. The walk to duval is not even a block away, great for getting home after the bars! We used the beach every day, which was wonderful, and the service at the beach and beach bar are always great. If you want a very nice hotel, great service, but still feel like Key West, (not a huge chain) this is the place. Love it!

Reviews.Title: “Solid Spot”
Reviews.Author: lynchy22
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Key West after spending 3 nights at the Pier House. From a resort standpoint in KW, I thought it was perfect. Has a very caribbean feel to it. Outdoor bar at the pool, restaurant, and Chart Room bar provides for quality onsite drinks and grub. Pool area was relaxing and clean. Small beach area if you aren't a big pool person. Rooms are nice and clean...a little small, but my feeling is that you don't head to KW to spend your time in a hotel room. Location is great...at the busier end of Duval Street but it's right on the water and set back enough so you do not catch the craziness out on the street. Probably not the best hotel for young children. Will stay at the PH again.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, nothing special”
Reviews.Author: NBrooks13
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff very friendly. The rooms are set up with a exterior type of entrance overlooking a outdoor atrium. The noice level is high because it echo's in the concrete hallways. We experienced a lot of loud groups of young spring breakers coming home from a night on duval street. Our room was a Garden view/Harbour view room. 2 double beds. No bath-only shower. Ceramic Floors. Ceiling Fans. Not very kid friendly. Small rooms, very high beds. Bathing kids without a tub is nearly impossible. Pool is nice.Hotel has towels and plenty of chairs. Beach was nice if the undertow/jellyfish would not have been bad. I probably would never stay here again because for the value it is overpriced. There are other hotels in the area that are a little more plush for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect !”
Reviews.Author: mln
Reviews.Content: We have been to Key West many times, but this was our first stay at the Pier House and we can't wait to return. The location is perfect...we either walked or rode bikes to wherever we wanted to go. The room was clean, staff was very helpful and friendly. We ate at the Harbour View restaurant for breakfast and lunch and the food and service were great. Also spent time at the beach bar and the Chart Room....more friendly people and good service. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for first time visit!!!”
Reviews.Author: tntrph
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Pier House April 6-11th and we really were pleased with this hotel. Wonderful location for our first trip to Key West!!! We were so close to everything (Mallory Square, restaurants, bars, etc) The hotel was super clean and the staff was very friendly. This is one the few hotels with a beach area and a beach bar and grill. Although we were so close to all the action, the resort was really peaceful and safe. I would highly recommend this hotel to any first time visitor who is struggling to make a decision on a place to stay. I took a chance after reading countless reviews on different hotels on tripadvisor and was thrilled with our decision!!!! P. S. The spa is also great!!! Wonderful massage!!!

Reviews.Title: “Location,Location,Location!”
Reviews.Author: valpoconnection
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend the room with the spiral staircase to the bedroom upstairs. The staff were friendly. The food was good. I would reccommend eating at Blue Heaven and having the Lobster Benedict. It was nice to look at all the boats going by. The location is where its at! Walk to everything! The cost of this hotel should be in question though. The pool is cold, and there isn't a beach. The deck is small. Safe and nice all in all.

Reviews.Title: “Funtastic”
Reviews.Author: creteman1
Reviews.Content: Great location - 1 Duval - but not in the middle of the craziness. Nice beach and pool with gorgeous landscaping. Lanai room was spacious with a nice little patio. Our third time staying here and no regrets except leaving too soon.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: barharborvisitor
Reviews.Content: A very conveniently located hotel, with a beautiful private beach, very clean rooms and terrific service. We would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't stay at hotel, got body treatment & visited the Wine Galley Piano Bar”
Reviews.Author: BellaDnna1
Reviews.Content: I had the privilege of enjoying the Tropical Anti-Aging Wrap on March 1 and was pampered beyond belief. I was surprised that the cost was no more expensive than if I had a similar treatment at home in upstate NY. Whether a local or a tourist, if it's do-able, I highly recommend it.
